name: cat_hopper
description: ## Background Cat Hopper is a simple and classic looking game where the runner, a cat, jumps over obstacles in a setting of a town. As time passes in the game, the faster the cat will run making it more and more challenging. There is only one rule: don't run into any obstacles. If the cat hits an obstacle, then the game will start over and if the user has a highscore then they would be put onto the score board.
